about.description: PyVista: 3D plotting and mesh analysis through a streamlined interface for the Visualization Toolkit (VTK). PyVista is a helper module for the Visualization Toolkit (VTK) that takes a different approach on interfacing with VTK through NumPy and direct array access. This package provides a Pythonic, well-documented interface exposing VTK's powerful visualization backend to facilitate rapid prototyping, analysis, and visual integration of spatially referenced datasets. This module can be used for scientific plotting for presentations and research papers as well as a supporting module for other mesh dependent Python modules.
about.summary: 3D plotting and mesh analysis through a streamlined interface for the Visualization Toolkit (VTK)

name: pyvista
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyvista" %}
{% set version = "0.45.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/pyvista-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: bca39f5ea17e45f40070ab45423dfd2c4fc81c33e0fb565bafded81c024fd04f

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - matplotlib-base >=3.0.1
    - numpy
    - pillow
    - pooch
    - scooby >=0.5.1
    - typing-extensions
    - vtk-base !=9.4.0,!=9.4.1,<9.5.0

test:
  imports:
    - pyvista
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/pyvista/pyvista
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 3D plotting and mesh analysis through a streamlined interface for the Visualization Toolkit (VTK)

  description: |
    PyVista: 3D plotting and mesh analysis through a streamlined interface for the Visualization Toolkit (VTK). PyVista is a helper module for the Visualization Toolkit (VTK) that takes a different approach on interfacing with VTK through NumPy and direct array access. This package provides a Pythonic, well-documented interface exposing VTK's powerful visualization backend to facilitate rapid prototyping, analysis, and visual integration of spatially referenced datasets. This module can be used for scientific plotting for presentations and research papers as well as a supporting module for other mesh dependent Python modules.
  doc_url: https://docs.pyvista.org/
  dev_url: https://github.com/pyvista/pyvista

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - banesullivan
    - akaszynski
